name: Kuusou
description: $KUUSOU is a Solana-based community coin that began as a meme but has quickly evolved into a broader brand. It represents a movement built around a halo-wearing cloud mascot and a dedicated community known as Cloud Gang. Beyond simple token trading, $KUUSOU integrates anime-inspired art, and plans for physical merchandise like plush toys. The project actively emphasizes creativity, charity, and long-term brand growthâ€”positioning itself as more than just another meme coin. By combining digital culture, anime aesthetics, and community-driven initiatives, $KUUSOU aims to become a recognizable brand that resonates with both crypto enthusiasts and mainstream audiences.
